availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, Aug 18 -- 1862.
Hon: Nat Gaither Sec: of State -- The following Comms. have issued & are delivered viz:

Joseph N. Luckett Capt:
John A. Mobley -- 1 Lieut
Lewis P. Owen -- 2 "
Wm Edwards -- Capt:
James P. Sharp -- 1 Lieut
Wm Craig 2 Lieut:
Harvey I. Burns Capt:
Cincinnattus Hendren 1 Lieut
James H. Kelly 2 Lieut:
Turner W. Bottom Capt
Lewis C. Gabbert 1st Lieut
John D. Hale 2d Lieut
Ben L. Borton Capt:
Wm M. Searcy -- 1st Lieut:
Chas. K. Elder -- 2d. Lieut:
John L. Neal -- Capt
John W. Jenkins -- 1st Lieut
Archibald T. Taylor 2d. Lieut: } All dated Aug: 15, 1862 --
2
Wm G. Conner -- Captain
Wm W. Edwards -- 1 Lieut.
Henry C. Rodenbaugh 2 Lieut
Urijah W. Oldham Captain
Charles A. Clark 1 Lieut:
Lilburn A. Black 2 Lieut } Both dated Aug 15, 1862
John R. Talfer 2 Lieut: dated Aug. 19. 1862
Milton Graham Capt:
Wm H. Bell -- 1 Lieut:
James W. Robertson 2 Lieut } dated Aug. 17. 1862
Anson L. Burke 2d Lieut: dated Aug 18. 1862
Quintin C. Shanks 2d Lieut
Nathl. L. Lightfoot -- " --
Wm R. Kinney -- " --
Eldred E. Pate -- " --
Garland J. Blewitt Adjt } all dated Aug 16, 1862
James A. Thomas Q. Mas. dated Aug 19. 1862
Stephen Stone Q. Mas -- " -- " -- " -- "
B. F. Hungerford Chaplain -- " -- " -- " -- "
John T. Wall 2d Lieut -- " -- " 18 -- "
L. L. Pinkerton Asst. Surg -- " -- " 19 -- "
Silas Howe 2d Lieut -- " -- " -- " -- "
Larkin J. Proctor -- " -- " -- " -- " -- "
Benja A. Skakspear -- " -- " -- " -- " -- "
Continued --
